entry.summary:

7-Piece Neem Wood Kitchen Ladle Set – Natural, Handcrafted & Plastic-Free

Handcrafted for Conscious Kitchens

Bring intention and sustainability to your everyday cooking with our 7-piece Neem Wood Kitchen Ladle Set. Thoughtfully handcrafted by skilled artisans, this eco-friendly utensil set is made from 100% natural neem wood—known for its antibacterial properties, durability, and non-toxic nature.

This complete cooking set includes ladles and spatulas for frying, flipping, stirring, sautéing, and serving—making it a must-have for any kitchen looking to reduce plastic use and embrace zero-waste living. Each tool is smooth-finished, heat-resistant, and gentle on non-stick cookware, offering both elegance and everyday functionality.

Features:

  • 7 handcrafted neem wood utensils for versatile cooking needs
  • Sustainably sourced, plastic-free, and fully biodegradable
  • Naturally antibacterial and safe for daily use
  • Non-toxic, heat-resistant, and safe for non-stick cookware
  • Elegant, smooth finish with engraved Almitra Sustainables logo
  • Made by artisans, supporting ethical and traditional craftsmanship

Crafted for conscious kitchens that care about the planet and their health — this neem wood ladle set is a beautiful step toward a greener, plastic-free lifestyle.

entry.title: .Premium Coir Bottle Brush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 300.00

When using a reusable bottle one thing that is necessary is to keep it clean. While you carry your bottles to work, gym or while travelling, it is likely to get exposed to bacteria which overtime can build up in your bottle if left unchecked. Cleaning bottles might seem like a task unlike other kitchenware but with this Almitra Sustainables Bottle Brush it’s a cake walk!

Introducing Premium Coir Bottle Brush, made from plant-based coir bristles and light weight handle to swiftly get your bottles cleaned up. This brush is ergonomically designed featuring a long handle with bent top to wash hard to reach areas of bottles. Naturally antibacterial Coir bristles in this brush keeps the bacteria, mold and odour at bay, ensuring clean drinking from your bottle.

This Coir Essential is made proudly in India by the rural artisans using traditional hand craft skills and modern technology which defines it’s contemporary & revolutionary design. Adding this coir brush to your kitchen will make way for a safe, healthy and clean kitchen.

*Size – L – 35 cm | D- 3.5 cm

*Material – Plant-Based, Handle: wood | Bristle: Coconut Fibre

*Care – Rinse with mild soapy water and hang in the sun to dry.

*Packaging – We ensure that all our packaging is eco-friendly

entry.title: Kitchen Hard Scrub Brush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 180.00

Burnt the bottom of your cooker while cooking rice or your Pan while cooking some curry? Then you know the headache of getting rid of those burnt marks!

While metal scourers does the job but it comes with a price. The sharp edges of these scourers can cut into the skin; it leaves scratch marks on the kitchenware; they slowly start to shed which is detrimental as eventually it can end up in your food.

To tackle this mindfully we have designed a natural hard scrub brush made from the Bassine fiber. Yes unlike coir, this fiber is more on the tougher side derived from the Palmyra Palms and is known to have an excellent durability and efficient cleaning property which can take up any intense cleaning task.

Features:

– Comfortable wooden handle with a groove that allows for a perfect grip.

– Palm size brush to easily reach the tight spots.

– Unlike heavy scratches that come from using metal scourers, the marks left by our brush are much faint and milder.

Now do away with the burnt marks in your kitchenware easily with our Kitchen Hard Scrub Brush. This brush is Sustainable and proudly made in India by the local artisans

*Note- not suitable for use on coated utensils.

*Size – Length – 10 cm | Bristle Length – 1.5 cm |Brush Width – 3 cm

*Material – Plant-Based, Handle: wood Bristle: Bassine Fibre

*Care – Rinse with mild soapy water and hang in the sun to dry.

*Disposal – put it in Compost

*Packaging – We ensure that all our packaging is Eco-friendly

A perfect Combo for those Coconut lovers!

The lightweight rustic cutlery is naturally stylish and can make great companion when you are on the go! By using our Coconut cutlery, one can avoid tons of single-use plastic waste, promoting a plastic-free and healthy environment.

Our Coconut Bowls are made from coconuts which are discarded as waste after their juice and flesh has been used. The coconut shells are then thoroughly cleaned and cut to make Coconut Bowls which can be a great way to enjoy your early morning salads or rice bowls and much more.

1 × Fork

entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 1100.00

Sustainable Coconut Bowl Set – Pack of 4

Handcrafted Coconut Bowl Set – 100% Natural & Sustainable

Bring nature to your table with our Handcrafted Coconut Bowl Set, made from reclaimed coconut shells that would otherwise go to waste. Each bowl is carefully polished to preserve its natural texture and unique grain—making every piece one-of-a-kind.

Perfect for smoothie bowls, salads, snacks, or even as rustic home decor, these coconut bowls are the ideal blend of style, sustainability, and function.

Product Highlight:

  • Crafted from discarded coconut shells, giving them new life and reducing landfill waste.
  • Made by local artisans, ensuring ethical production and fair trade practices.
  • Free from chemicals, plastics, and artificial coatings—just 100% pure coconut shell.
  • Lightweight yet sturdy, with a smooth interior for hassle-free cleaning.

Care Tips:
Hand wash with lukewarm water and avoid dishwashers and microwaves to extend the life of your bowl.
